name: simple-erc20

scripts.startBscTestnet: truffle migrate --network bscTestnet --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_contractsSelected% --network bscTestnet
scripts.startBscMainnet: truffle migrate --network bscMainnet --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_contractsSelected% --network bscMainnet
scripts.startRinkeby: truffle migrate --network rinkeby --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_contractsSelected% --network rinkeby
scripts.startEthMainnet: truffle migrate --network mainnet --reset && truffle run verify %npm_package_contractsSelected% --network mainnet

contractsSelected: Migrations ERC20Token ERC20TokenFactory Presale PresaleFactory Locker
